Yesterday, during the @HouseScience Energy Subcommittee hearing on Fusion, I expressed strong support for the advancement of fusion power, continued investment in traditional energy sources, and highlighted the imperative to maintain leadership in this critical area of energy development.

The AI race will likely be won by the nation with the most abundant, reliable, low cost power. It’s a race the U.S. cannot afford to lose.

78 years of strength and resolve. 

Happy Birthday to our United States Air Force!

I couldn’t be more excited about this technology opportunity for Alaska High School and Middle School students! 
 
If you have an app idea that you want to make a reality, the Congressional App Challenge is your chance to showcase your coding skills. 
 
You can learn more & register at: https://t.co/S2262iX4lt

This is why America must lead the way in resource development.

Alaska does development right with effective protections for communities and the environment. 

We must continue to unleash our abundant resource potential, and there is no greater jurisdiction to do that than Alaska. 
https://t.co/6BrNeDJuBU

Today before the @NatResources  Subcommittee on Oversight and Investigations, we discussed unleashing Alaska’s resource potential with a phenomenal line up of Alaskans who traveled from the Last Frontier to testify before the committee.
 
Alaska stands ready to meet the nation’s resource needs but more work must be done to expedite permitting and increase domestic production so America can compete on a global scale in resource production.

Renewable energy is Chinese energy. Why? China controls critical portions of the supply chain for producing that energy. 

Congress has the responsibility to unlock America’s full potential.

The United States must once again mine, build, and develop its own resources and end China’s chokehold on critical minerals once and for all.

Today, we honor the men and women who tragically lost their lives on 9/11. 

On this 24th Anniversary of one of the most harrowing moments in American history, we are reminded that there is power in people coming together in remembrance of those who have fallen. 

In the wake of recent unspeakable tragedies, there has never been a more critical time to stand unified as Americans. 

May God bless and continue to heal our nation.

Charlie Kirk was a bold leader. He helped shape a generation of young people who fearlessly love America.
 
Charlie was a true American hero, and the movement he helped build will only grow after his passing.
 
The left is playing a dangerous game in selling a continuous stream of lies to the American public about the America First movement, about the nature of bills being passed in Washington, and about the conservative policies that they oppose. As they lose the battle of ideas, the left has reverted to violence and slander when faced with a difference of opinions. We must get back to a place of civil discourse in this country. 
 
My wife Dharna and I are praying for Charlie’s family and for healing within our nation.
Please join me in praying for Charlie Kirk and his family.
Alaska’s abundant resource potential provides the pathway for a stronger, more secure America!

A very memorable evening at the @WhiteHouse last night with the grand opening of the Rose Garden Club. We are working to restore leadership, safety, and classical style in our nation’s capital. https://t.co/pDJcJj0Vxr
This is the power of a team working together to get things done for Alaska!

The 2024 Central Yukon plan locks up more than 13 million acres of public land in one of Alaska’s most impoverished regions and blocks projects vital to our nation’s energy security and economic future. 

With this resolution, we are restoring balance to federal land policy and ensuring that Alaska can responsibly contribute to America’s energy and mineral independence. 

Alaskans know how to balance stewardship and development, and I am proud to have championed this legislation in the House that restores responsible management of our state’s resources.

The dedication, grit, and hard work of the American worker have helped build our nation from the ground up. 

Under the strong America First leadership of @POTUS and @HouseGOP - we are witnessing a renewed sense of optimism and strength within America’s workforce. 

A very happy Labor Day to America’s incredible workers. Thank you for all you do, and may God bless the American worker!

Great things in store for Alaska and our country. 

North, to the Future! https://t.co/qeVpa7HUnx

Washington’s bureaucracy shouldn’t be telling people how to drive, build, or power their homes. 

As a member of @HouseScience Energy Subcommittee, we are laser focused on cutting red tape and making decisions based on sound policy. No one has a trademark on science. Process, data, and balance must lead policy.

Great news for Alaska and America’s forests. Today, the @USDA announced the next step in rolling back the outdated 2001 Roadless Rule by opening a public comment period.

Rescinding the rule is about restoring our national forests to their proper and intended uses. I applaud this critical step toward restoring balance and protecting Alaska’s future.
https://t.co/TsszzmNsHA

Alaska’s mineral wealth is indispensable - not just for our state’s economy, but for America’s energy security. Greens Creek Mine exemplifies how our nation can responsibly tap into critical mineral reserves to reduce reliance on foreign adversaries and support domestic supply while also fueling innovations.

Great projections coming out of the North Slope with @SantosLtd  Pikka Phase 1 project. 21 wells drilled, and first oil is expected by Q1 in 2026!

There is no better jurisdiction than Alaska when it comes to responsible development. 

Under the Trump Administration, we are developing, we are building, and we are delivering for the American people.

South Korea, as the world’s third-largest importer of liquefied natural gas (LNG), is actively seeking reliable, long-term energy solutions to diversify away from adversarial suppliers. 

Alaska’s LNG project offers a historic opportunity to meet these needs, fortify our alliances, and bolster American national security.

Our future prosperity and national security require strong, enduring relationships with our partners in the Indo-Pacific.

Read my latest op-ed in the @WashTimes ⬇️ https://t.co/YMACCFS0hA

I had the pleasure connecting with @FCC Commissioner, Olivia Trusty who came to Alaska to review broadband deployment progress including long-haul connections that link our communities, satellite connectivity in Alaska’s most remote regions, and fiber to the home projects that ensure Alaskan families and employers can fully participate in today’s economy.

Broadband is essential to keeping our state strong and connected, and I am grateful for the partnership and ongoing commitment to making sure every corner of Alaska has access to the connectivity we need.

This week, I had the opportunity to visit Red Dog Mine - a pillar of Northwest Alaska’s economy and the largest zinc mine in the world. 

Red Dog faces a serious challenge: current ore deposits are projected to run out by 2031. Without new development, the impacts on Alaska’s economy and our communities would be devastating.

Alaska’s future depends on responsible development and Red Dog is a perfect example of why that development is needed - supporting jobs, families, and communities across the region.

In Congress, I will continue working to streamline permitting and support efforts to explore new deposits - the time to act is now. 

Mine in America starts with Mine in Alaska.

Alaska possesses all the resources America needs to deliver energy and mineral independence. Thanks to the leadership of @POTUS and @HouseGOP, Alaska is able to deliver!

Read my latest op-ed with @SecDuffy ⬇️ https://t.co/i3031wOiDQ

America leads from the front, not from the sidelines. 

In Alaska, we understand well that decisive leadership and bold vision are prerequisites for achieving the great things most would not dare to even attempt. 

Thank you @POTUS for pursuing peace, and thank you for choosing Alaska for this historic dialogue. 

North to the Future.

My office is closely monitoring the threat of catastrophic flooding in Juneau. A flood warning has been issued and an active response is currently underway.

This is a critical time for all residents to stay alert and prioritize safety. I urge everyone in the affected areas to sign up for emergency alerts and heed all warnings from local officials at https://t.co/1ID3mHNTzL and @NWSJuneau 

My prayers are with the people of Juneau as they face this challenge and the local leaders working tirelessly to protect homes, infrastructure, and lives.

The commissioning of the @USCG Cutter Storis is an important symbol of our recommitment to maritime and Arctic security. 

USCGC Storis, Welcome Home. https://t.co/yJyu6MaEGf

Headed out to Juneau this morning for the commissioning ceremony for Coast Guard Cutter Storis. The first new icebreaker for the @USCG in 25 years. 

Semper Paratus! https://t.co/BruorKaLna

The pursuit of peace requires open dialogue. And it’s encouraging that the dialogue will be occurring at the highest levels here in Alaska, where Russia and America share a historic relationship and geographic proximity. My prayer is that the conversations are productive and result in meaningful progress toward reconciliation.

Alaskans rely on the U.S. Coast Guard as part of their daily lives. Whether that be commercial fishermen navigating the Bering Sea or remote coastal regions depending on emergency response – Alaskans depend on the Coast Guard to answer the call. 

Happy Birthday 235th Birthday @USCG. Semper Paratus.

My office welcomed these two hardworking interns this summer and they have been an integral part of our team with an impressive work ethic and eagerness to learn on the job. 

Internship opportunities on Capitol Hill provide aspiring professionals with a first-hand window into the legislative process and the daily workings of a Congressional office - providing invaluable real workplace experience. 

Happy National Intern Day!

Today’s trade deal announcement with South Korea will unlock $350B in investment and includes $100B in energy purchases! A strategic trade deal that will fuel our economy, strengthen national security, and spearhead energy dominance. This is why an LNG pipeline in Alaska is essential. 

Let’s get it done!

GDP surged 3% in Q2 - exceeding expectations and proving what a strong, America-First economy can do under the leadership of @POTUS and @HouseGOP  Republicans in Congress. 

With inflation cooling and consumer confidence rising, hard-working Americans seeing results.

We’re building an economy that puts America First and opens the door for U.S. businesses to thrive and compete in the worldwide marketplace.

My team and I are closely monitoring the aftermath of the magnitude 8.8 earthquake near Russia’s Kamchatka Peninsula.

Grateful to @NWS_NTWC and @NOAA for their swift work keeping communities informed in potential tsunami impact zones.
Please stay alert and follow updates from https://t.co/NIK84nSXnS for accurate, real-time information.

Alaska has a significant role to play in our nation going forward. The pathway to energy security and prosperity begins with our resources and potential in Alaska. 

Read more from my exclusive interview with @DailyCaller https://t.co/UVfViC1qsN

President Trump’s historic trade deal with the EU is good news for the American worker and a huge opportunity for American energy production. 

The new U.S.–EU trade deal means $750B in U.S. energy exports—fuel that can and should come from Alaska. 

Under the strong leadership of @POTUS, we are on our way to addressing global trade deficits, reinvesting in domestic infrastructure, and ensuring the U.S. remains a global energy powerhouse. #AmericaFirst

With the GENIUS Act now law, America is on a strong trajectory to lead in the digital asset space. However, there is more work to be done. The Senate must pass the CLARITY Act so the U.S. can continue to build upon that trajectory. 

Read more from me and @GOPMajorityWhip in our latest op-ed: https://t.co/Eo6GCaKj5P

Last week, the House Transportation & Infrastructure Committee welcomed Secretary of Transportation @SecDuffy   before the committee to discuss American infrastructure priorities - including modernizing our ATC systems. Congress is ready to meet the demands of our growing infrastructure needs and continue delivering for the American people. @TransportGOP
Can confirm.

Today, the House passed three landmark pieces of crypto legislation that position the United States to become the global leader in digital assets and fulfill the President’s commitment to establish a strong framework for digital payments.

The GENIUS Act is now headed to the President’s desk for signature. This critical bill strengthens our financial and national security strategy by creating a clear framework for stablecoin issuers - ensuring U.S. leadership in the digital asset space.

Meanwhile, the CLARITY Act and the Anti-CBDC Surveillance State Act are advancing to the Senate for consideration.

What’s next for digital assets? 

Let’s take up the BITCOIN Act, improve our national reserve asset balance sheet, and secure America’s Strategic Bitcoin Reserve!
An Administration that puts Alaska and our potential - first.

H.R. 410 has passed the House! 

The men and women who served our nation during the Vietnam War deserve the opportunity to secure the land they were promised. With the passage of H.R. 410, we can extend an important land allotment program and ensure that Alaska Native Vietnam-era veterans will have the time and resources they need to make their final land selections.

It’s Crypto Week here in Congress! 

As the most pro-Crypto Congress to date, we are ready to pass some landmark legislation that will strengthen digital asset projects, drive greater innovation, and protect the American consumer. 🇺🇸

As global demand for launch facilities grows, Alaska’s spaceports can meet those demands. With our strategic location, airspace, and growing infrastructure, Alaska is well positioned to be the hub for commercial and research launches. It’s time to lead in aerospace and next-generation hypersonic technology. 🚀

Our prayers go out to all those impacted by the numerous wildfires burning across Interior Alaska. We are witnessing devastating impacts due to unusually dry and hot conditions across the Interior. 

My team and I are incredibly grateful to the first responders, firefighters, and National Guardsmen working tirelessly on the front lines to combat these fires. American Patriots serving our great state around the clock. Stay strong!

Absolutely heroic actions coming out of Texas with the response of our @USCG. Always mission-ready and committed to serve in times of disaster. 

Praying for all those impacted by this devastating flood and continued safety for all those involved in recovery efforts.

On this Independence Day, we celebrate 249 years of bold vision, revolutionary courage, and the innovative spirit that is the United States of America.

May God continue to bless this remarkable country! https://t.co/cniegiZyXP
Great day to deliver on the promises made to the American people! The One Big Beautiful Bill is headed to the President’s desk 🇺🇸 @POTUS @SpeakerJohnson https://t.co/gRLvpQyhSF

Today, the Republican-led Congress sent the One Big Beautiful Bill Act to the President’s desk, and with it a blueprint for Alaska’s self-determined future. I am honored to serve and deliver for the state we love:

☑️Unlocking our resources. Mandatory lease sales open 1.6 million acres in ANWR, 20 million acres in the NPR-A, and 6 million acres in Cook Inlet - more than 30 million acres in total, almost the size of the entire state of Florida! Alaska will receive a greater share of federal royalties than ever before, growing the Permanent Fund and keeping PFDs strong for decades.

☑️Putting money back in your pocket. Overtime and tips are now tax-free, small-business depreciation is immediate, and the Trump tax cuts are made permanent so families can save, and businesses can hire. Further, there are even additional deductions for seniors on Social Security.

☑️Securing the border. More than $100 billion in new resources equips Border Patrol agents and delivers advanced technology to help stop fentanyl before it reaches Alaska’s towns and villages.

☑️Investing in safety. The single largest Coast Guard appropriation in U.S. history funds 16 new Arctic-class icebreakers and major port upgrades, while $12.5 billion modernizes Air Traffic Control. This bill protects mariners, pilots, and every community that depends on them.

☑️Protecting care where it is needed. Medicaid integrity reforms guarantee help for the truly vulnerable, and new rural-hospital funding helps keep all Alaskans healthy.

This legislation fulfills our longstanding goal: Alaska charting its own course, creating good-paying jobs today, and providing opportunity for generations to come.

North to the Future!

Big numbers for June! 

America First = Pro Growth

The American people are counting on Congress to pass the One Big Beautiful Bill Act and deliver on the America First promises that will make our nation prosperous, strong, and safe again. https://t.co/E0BYGO7smk

The One Big Beautiful Bill follows a tried and true blueprint for economic growth:

✅Lowers taxes for working families and retirees
✅Accelerates job-creating investments
✅Puts the American citizen First

The bill is a major first step toward greater self-determination for Alaskans and pushes back against the socialist impulse taking root within the regressive left.
Alaska is the cornerstone of a stronger energy sector in America. It all begins in the Last Frontier.
We must pass the One Big Beautiful Bill and make sure that we’re putting the American people first. 🇺🇸

It was a pleasure to join @GOPMajorityWhip at the 2025 Bitcoin Policy Summit - highlighting key updates on Bitcoin policy. A special thank you to @matthew_pines and @btcpolicyorg for hosting an incredible and productive summit.

Bitcoin is an important emerging asset, provides an historic opportunity for diversification of America’s balance sheet, and deserves serious policy consideration. Excited to join @GOPMajorityWhip Tom Emmer for a fireside chat at Bitcoin Policy Summit 2025 to talk all things Bitcoin on Capitol Hill.

Last week, I held a Veterans’ Townhall in Fairbanks to hear directly from those who have served our country. 

From the urgent need for additional Veteran Service Officers (VSOs) to addressing medical access and service delays - Alaska’s Veterans deserve better. 

I’m proud to be a Co-Sponsor of the Veterans ACCESS Act of 2025 which would guarantee timely VA appointments or care through community providers. 

I will continue to work alongside my colleagues in Congress to ensure veterans receive the dignity, care, and service they’ve earned.

Today’s decision by the @USDA to rescind the deeply flawed and outdated Roadless Rule is yet another a major victory for Alaska. 

Alaska’s forests are one of our state’s greatest natural assets and the “Roadless Rule” has long stifled responsible forest management, blocked access to critical resources, and halted economic opportunity 
particularly in Alaska, where 92% of the Tongass National Forest was off-limits.

The Roadless Rule was never about responsible conservation; it was about bureaucratic overreach that undermined the ability of local forest managers and communities to effectively manage their lands. 

I commend Secretary Rollins and President Trump for their leadership in advancing this commonsense reform. By removing these blanket prohibitions, the Administration is restoring the authority of local leaders to manage our forests correctly.
https://t.co/sN81Vhi4kX

President Trump was right to strike Iran. Weakness invites aggression—strength restores peace.

Tonight’s action sends a clear message: the United States will not hesitate to defend our people, our allies, or our interests. I fully support the President’s decisive leadership in holding the Iranian regime accountable.

God bless and protect our men and women serving this great nation.

Great to be back in Alaska this week bringing key updates back from DC and meeting with businesses, industry leaders, and families. 

Tonight, I had the opportunity to throw the ceremonial first pitch at the Midnight Sun baseball game in beautiful Fairbanks, Alaska - an Alaskan tradition that has gone uninterrupted for 120 years. What a way to celebrate our Alaskan summer with family and the community of Fairbanks. Nothing like the land of the midnight sun!

My first two bills — H.R. 42 and H.R. 43 — have officially passed the Senate and are now on their way to the President’s desk for signature.

I’m deeply honored to serve the people of Alaska in Congress. North, to the future. https://t.co/pLLNvKOyY4

In Alaska, over 15,000 tip workers will benefit from ZERO taxes on tips - an important provision in the One Big Beautiful Bill. 

This bill keeps more money in the hands of hard working Alaskans. In a state where the cost of living is high and every dollar matters, this change will have an immediate and meaningful impact.

Great news coming out of the U.S. Senate with the passage of the GENIUS Act - legislation that drives digital asset innovation and protects the U.S. consumer by ensuring smarter and more secure transactions when it comes to stablecoins. America is ready to lead in the race towards digital asset dominance and economic security!
America First policies = pro growth and higher wages for American workers. 🇺🇸

Modernizing our air traffic control system is absolutely critical as we move further into the 21st Century. 

The One Big Beautiful Bill delivers on these much needed aviation investments and puts the safety of the American people first.

There is no greater honor than being a dad to my son, Nicholas. It is a blessing I don’t take lightly. A very special Father’s Day shout out to all the dads out there who lead and support their families. God bless! https://t.co/0VuJrHSaB8
Alaska is ready to lead and deliver LNG that will strengthen our energy security, economy, and supply chains!
Today, we celebrate the 250th birthday of our incredible @USArmy. 250 years of integrity and dedication to fighting for our freedom. https://t.co/2uquv1VrGV
8/ Free trade requires fair trade, and fair trade requires a level playing field. America First Works.

7/ In a perfect vacuum, tariffs would likely result in a one-time bump in inflation, but we don’t live in a vacuum. Businesses in most nations want to be producers and will fulfill that production at competitive prices. As a result, tariffs as constructed have thus far resulted in lower inflation and unparalleled domestic investment.

6/ In addition to continued automation and AI integration, downward trajectories on consumption due to collapsing populations in East Asia and China have offset industrialization-driven demand and naturally offset inflation pressure.

5/ Over-levered with extraordinary corporate debt and “shadow financing” and compounded by this dramatically underutilized capacity, China must then drastically lower their prices to offset tariff impacts in order to compete with lower tariff jurisdictions. It’s either that or an economic crunch.

4/ HOWEVER, when we levy a massive tariff on China, the jigg is up! They can’t subsidize industry at the level necessary to remain competitive and the supply chains snap back to a more market-driven orientation, allowing the U.S. and our allies to compete on a more level playing field again.
3/ This drives margins so low that these producers often operate at a loss, but they remain competitive because of support from government subsidies.

2/ China has massive processing and manufacturing overcapacity across the board. They do this to drive out competition and achieve control over a given sector. They drop prices to rock bottom with the intention of becoming the only global supplier of a product or industry process.
Tariff-driven inflation hasn’t materialized. Why? Let’s examine some key factors in this THREAD: 1/🧵

Nuclear proliferation represents a tremendous risk to global stability, particularly in the hands of regimes which threaten the very existence of a nation or a people. 

Iran has repeatedly and for decades called for “Death to America” and “Death to Israel. Statements like these have become official policy for the current regime. When combined with continued development of programs in violation of nuclear non-proliferation obligations and active financial and logistical support for terrorism, escalating levels of response are necessary until such time as the regime’s capabilities for such activities are eliminated.

Weeks ago, recognizing the increasing regional risk, I joined colleagues in the House in co-sponsoring legislation that would apply pressure to Iran, encouraging them to come to the table to peacefully resolve these issues, including: 

H.R. 2574, No Iranian Energy Act

H.R. 2575, Iran Waiver Rescissions Act 

H.R. 1422, Enhanced Iran Sanctions Act

H.Res. 166, Supporting a Democratic, secular, and nonnuclear Republic of Iran

When Joe Biden released billions to the Iranian regime and relaxed oil sanctions, he accelerated their nuclear development ambitions. 

Weakness and “lead from behind” appeasement facilitated the current condition.
https://t.co/xGClIQqDBT

Honored to have @SecretaryBurgum testify before the House Committee on @NatResources to discuss the strategic importance of America’s resource and energy potential. Energy and minerals are key to both peace and prosperity - an important diplomatic tool that allows for strengthened relationships with key allies, and Alaska will lead the way!

Over 90,000 Alaskans who regularly work overtime will keep more of their paycheck thanks to the “no taxes on overtime” provision in the One Big Beautiful Bill.

The One Big Beautiful Bill puts the American worker FIRST.

Inflation has SLOWED in the month of May defying expectations. Turns out that strong leadership that prioritizes Americans is always good policy.

America First works for America’s working families. @POTUS  @SecScottBessent  @howardlutnick https://t.co/3vPnnEjk0D

Yesterday, the House passed a crucial piece of legislation, H.R. 884, a bill that secures elections in Washington, D.C. by ensuring only U.S. citizens have the right to vote in DC elections. 

This is an important step for election integrity - U.S. citizens and ONLY U.S. citizens should be voting in our elections. 🇺🇸

Excellent piece by EPA Administrator @epaleezeldin recognizing Alaska’s full potential as part of our energy and national security strategy. Alaska is the gateway to American prosperity! https://t.co/POJoFeDxtP

More Americans die every year from drug overdoses than U.S. service members lost in the entirety of the Vietnam War. With millions of illegal immigrants in our nation come drugs, human trafficking, forced labor, and more. 

What we have seen in Los Angeles is utter lawlessness. This behavior has no place in America’s communities, and the deployment of federal resources is consistent with the type of whole of government approach required to restore order and protect the innocent.

“There is much to be done and no time to waste.”

Great to join @DanNewsManBall  on @OANN last night as Congress continues to deliver for the American people on energy, border security, and economic growth.

Energy development in Alaska is no longer a domestic issue. It’s a powerful negotiating tool and one that we must wield wisely. 
https://t.co/SGyuUHEos0

Today, we honor and celebrate the 81st Anniversary of D-Day. 

D-Day was one of the most consequential moments in wartime history and marked a turning point during World War II. 

Thankful for the Greatest Generation and the sacrifice they made in serving our country. Their service will forever be honored and remembered.

Alaska’s strategic location in the Arctic is a critical component to our national security strategy and the @USCG plays a vital role in overseeing that mission. 

The One Big Beautiful Bill includes over $21 Billion to recapitalize assets and rebuild our shoreline infrastructure which are key to ensuring readiness and effective operations. 

Thank you Admiral Lunday for your testimony and insight before the House Transportation & Infrastructure Committee today. @TransportGOP

There is a great deal of confusion around the OBBBA. The Congressional Budget Office (CBO) scored growth over the next 10 years at 1.8%. At no point in modern history has the United States experienced such low growth as is projected by the CBO.  

Consider this:

- The Atlanta Fed’s most recent GDP estimate for Q2 is 4.6%!
- We are in the middle of an AI revolution.
- We are on the cusp of a robotics revolution.
- We have 8 Trillion dollars of new investment committed to the U.S. over the new several years. To put this into context, the U.S. GDP is approximately 28 Trillion, making this incremental investment commitment so large it actually dwarfs the entire 10 year CBO growth projection on its own.

The bottom line is that the CBO scoring for GDP is clearly flawed, and is being used to mislead the public. The One Big Beautiful Bill is pro-growth, responsible legislation that helps put us on a better track. 

Yes, more work is needed to address the deficit and debt - urgent issues. This is the beginning of that process, and it is a STRONG start.

Department of Interior @SecretaryBurgum is absolutely correct - the time for energy independence has never been more critical. Energy independence strengthens national security and unlocks a prosperous nation. It is a cornerstone of American freedom.
The left may protest resource development, but any true environmentalist would demand resource work be done where it’s done best: Alaska.
The road to American prosperity begins in Alaska!

Great to run into @SecDuffy at DCA today. Grateful for his leadership at the Department of Transportation and the progress he has made at @USDOT to secure our skies. I look forward to building upon that momentum in Congress as we lead the U.S. into a new era of aviation safety and excellence.
Alaska’s right to self-determination is being restored. Thank you @SecretaryBurgum and @POTUS for your leadership and recognizing Alaska’s extraordinary resource potential. https://t.co/Hw3K5oTA5a

America finally has a Bitcoin champion in the White House! @VP @TheBitcoinConf 

Unlike traditional fiat currencies, Bitcoin is open to all, resistant to centralized control, and built for the digital age. At its core, it’s about personal freedom and financial sovereignty. 

Proud to continue working with @SenLummis to advance the BITCOIN Act in Congress and help lead America into a new era of digital assets.

Our skies must be the safest in the
world. It starts with upgrading air
traffic control.

Today, we honor the memory of our fallen soldiers who selflessly fought to defend our liberty and sacrificed their lives for this great country.

Let us also remember the families who carry the weight of their sacrifice. Their strength reminds us that the cost of freedom is not borne by our service members alone, but by the families who stand behind them.

As we observe this Memorial Day, Americans stand united in gratitude. May we never forget the price that has been paid for our freedom.

What started as a maverick idea has become a worldwide movement. 

Bitcoin decouples and disintermediates store of value from the state and reconnects that value directly with the individual. 

Bitcoin is unique because it creates a completely new frontier for economic freedom.

I just voted YES on H.R. 1: The Big Beautiful Bill.

Last year, voters gave Republicans a clear mandate: cut reckless spending, secure the border, and grow our economy - and we delivered.

This bill is a game-changer for working families and small businesses in Alaska and across America:

✅ $1.5 TRILLION in deficit reduction - the largest in nearly 30 years - while protecting the integrity of critical programs like Medicaid and SNAP
 ✅ Trump tax cuts made permanent - keeping life more affordable for hardworking Alaskans
 ✅ No tax on tips, overtime, or car loan interest
 ✅ $140+ BILLION for the strongest border security in U.S. history
 ✅ American energy unleashed - driving down costs and powering prosperity
 ✅ Medicaid & SNAP integrity restored - ensuring benefits go to those who truly need them
 ✅ $144 BILLION invested to strengthen our military and defend our nation

I’ve always said: American prosperity starts in Alaska - and The Big Beautiful Bill puts America First and Alaska back on the map.

It’s an honor to serve and deliver real results that matter.

During today’s @NatResources Energy & Mineral Resources Subcommittee hearing, we discussed the strategic importance of ensuring Congress provides adequate support for hazard mitigation efforts that protect aviation safety and economic stability. With more than 50 active volcanoes in Alaska, it is essential that Congress continues to invest in initiatives that help safeguard against the threats posed by volcanic eruptions.

House Republicans just finished an historic meeting with @POTUS  here on Capitol Hill and we are more committed than ever to delivering for the American people.
 
The One Big Beautiful Bill Act is a defining moment for the country and marks the single most significant step toward restoring fiscal sanity in a generation. It delivers over $1.6 trillion in real savings while unleashing our nation’s full energy potential as a key revenue builder. 

Let’s get back to putting America First.

It was a privilege to meet with @FBIDirectorKash during #NationalPoliceWeek to discuss the FBI’s commitment to upholding the rule of law and ending the two-tiered system of justice in our country. We will continue to back the brave men and women in law enforcement who selflessly protect our nation.

Proud to lead this bipartisan legislation with @RepLauraGillen  to address youth suicide.

Investing in the future of our youth and supporting suicide prevention measures is paramount to a stronger America and Alaska.

Our men and women in law enforcement answer the call and selflessly serve our communities every day. 

As we observe National Police Week, take a moment to honor our Law Enforcement Officers for their dedication and service. 

Back the Blue. https://t.co/QJdmyrLXkQ

Yesterday, the @NatResources  Subcommittee on Energy and Mineral Resources held a field hearing focused on advancing geothermal energy. America’s energy security depends on our ability to act boldly and unleash the resources beneath our feet - but that requires leadership that tackles regulatory hurdles and streamlines permitting processes. Thank you @RepPeteStauber and @RepMaloyUtah for leading this productive hearing.
To my incredible wife, Dharna, who is an amazing and selfless mom, and to all the wonderful moms out there on this special day, Happy Mother’s Day! https://t.co/ax6vhwDYZx

The safety and efficiency of our national airspace relies on the dedication and expertise of air traffic controllers who work around the clock to keep our skies safe.

Today marks 100 days since I took the oath of office to serve the people of Alaska in the U.S. Congress. 

During this time, we have made incredible progress unlocking Alaska’s full energy and resource potential, passing key legislation out of the House, and in so doing have put the people of America First. 

I came to Washington to advance Alaska’s case in the halls of Congress and to restore commonsense responsible government that works for citizens. I look forward to continuing that mission on behalf of the people of our great state.

We are restoring American strength at home and abroad. That begins with unleashing energy, securing our borders, reining in wasteful spending, and putting American families first.

Tonight, President Trump reaffirmed his vision for a stronger America. That vision is one that prioritizes economic strength, national security, and prosperity for hardworking families. In just two short months, we’ve already seen a decisive shift toward restoring the American Dream, and I am committed to working alongside the President to continue delivering real results for Alaskans.  

House Republicans are laser-focused on fulfilling the agenda that the American people overwhelmingly supported in November. That means passing key legislation to cut taxes, make life more affordable, secure our southern border, and bring manufacturing and energy production back to the United States. It’s time to roll back the damage done by the failed Biden-Harris policies, and that work has already begun.  

Alaska is poised to play a central role in America’s energy resurgence. Under President Trump’s leadership, we have an opportunity to unleash our full resource potential—creating jobs, driving down energy costs, and ensuring the United States is no longer dependent on foreign adversaries for the resources we need. That means pushing forward with responsible resource development in the Arctic, opening new opportunities for drilling and mining, and finally getting Alaska’s long-awaited LNG pipeline across the finish line.  

For far too long, Washington bureaucrats and radical environmentalists have stood in the way of Alaska’s ability to fuel not just our state, but the nation. Those days are over. Under the leadership of President Trump, we can produce more, refine more, and lead the world in energy innovation. Alaska’s resources must be at the forefront of America’s energy dominance, and I am committed to ensuring we develop them responsibly while strengthening our economy.  

I was especially encouraged by President Trump’s focus on rebuilding American industry. His leadership has already spurred nearly $2 trillion in private investment commitments, bringing manufacturing jobs back to our shores. This resurgence will strengthen our economy, create good-paying jobs, and ensure that America—and Alaska—remain at the forefront of innovation and production.  

Tonight’s address was a strong reminder of the clear path we have ahead: a future of growth, prosperity, and security under President Trump. I look forward to working with my colleagues in Congress to advance the Trump agenda and deliver for the people of Alaska.

If we want to ensure our sovereignty as a nation and remain self-determinant, energy production is key. We must support American production right here at home. This tax was a misguided policy that weakened energy security and increased reliance on foreign energy by punishing American producers. If we want to get serious about energy secuity and economic growth, this tax must be repealed to ensure a stronger energy future for all Americans.

I look forward to advancing the America First agenda in Congress as we proceed to Budget Reconcilliation.
